text:
trump had 3 YEARS to prepare for a situation like coronavirus.

Instead, he tweeted, golfed, grifted, cut funding to the CDC, and fired the pandemic folks.

EVERYONE SHOULD BE FURIOUS.

Lives are being turned upside down.
And that jackass is still up to his petty nonsense.
